name: Hilton Garden Inn BWI Airport

reviews.title: Pricey for what is offered
reviews.text: Stayed here for three nights for a company sales meeting. The room rates at $159 per night seemed quite high especially considering we had over 12 people staying multiple nights.

reviews.title: Hard to Beat for the price
reviews.text: The rooms were very comfotable - and they are beginning remodel the rooms with new carpet, drapes, LCD TV's, etc. Having a microwave and a fridge in the room was nice (although the fridge, even being set at the lowest setting, froze my beverages).

reviews.title: Loved it.....Great Hotel....Would stay here again...
reviews.text: Breakfast is not included. Pool is too small for laps. Gym needs an overhaul.

reviews.title: Good Value
reviews.text: The airport is very close and they provide a free shuttle to and from the airport.

reviews.title: Horrible Experience at Hilton BWI
reviews.text: We had an issue with the shuttle driver making unwanted advances toward one of our female collegues. The hotel was made aware, moved her from room to room for safety, and hopefully have taken steps to dismiss him from the staff. The other staff members were very nice and helpful.

reviews.title: First and Last Stay at this hotel
reviews.text: I stayed in this hotel to attend a five day class. There are an incredible number of brand new hotels in this area, but as Hilton is on my company's preferred hotel list, I decided to stay here and used some of the Trip Advisor's reviews to make that decision.

reviews.title: Great hotel
reviews.text: That said, it took me a week to get rid of the backache from sleeping on their poor (old?) mattress. The pillows were very lumpy and the sheets were very thin. I would describe the room as "average" in decor and amenities. There was a very large "patch" on the wall beside the bed and one of the large pictures had been removed.

reviews.title: Park and Fly
reviews.text: I went to the breakfast buffet on the first morning and although there were no signs at all, someone came and tapped me on the shoulder as I left to ask how I wished to pay for breakfast. Naturally, everyone else I interacted with in the class was getting free breakfast with made-to-order omelets and waffles and several also stayed at hotels with "manager's specials" for evening food that amounted to free dinner.

reviews.title: Nice hotel, some small problems
reviews.text: The staff I encountered were all very courteous, professional and friendly, but I would stay somewhere else the next time.

reviews.title: Stay Here Every Time In Balto!
reviews.text: This is great hotel that you should stay at. the rooms were big with ac,mini fridge,microwave,2 queen beds,good view,nice alarm clock,large bathroom,tv,phone,soft geen chair,and a desk. the main lobby is awsome it has tvs a resraunt and they put out fresh fruit and cookies. its also a great place to read. the airport is 3 mins away.also in the the main lobby the have a area were they have drinks candy and snacks for a cost. this hotel has a exersice room and a pool.

reviews.title: Great value, beautiful new hotel
reviews.text: Beautiful new property I have stayed at a few times.

reviews.title: Great Location and Service
reviews.text: I arrived very late and was a little upset they had me staying in a room furthest from the elevators *44, but overall it was a good experience.

reviews.title: exceeded our expectations
reviews.text: Checkin was quick, the business center was open, though one printer simply did not work, and I didn't have the time to troubleshoot it. The other one worked but the print quality was very poor.

reviews.title: Great place good location
reviews.text: When I walked into the room it first felt like it was 80-90 degrees, but quickly cooled down.

reviews.title: Loved the Garden Inn
reviews.text: I was a bit disgusted by the stains in the bathtub, but overall the room was clean.

reviews.title: The Garden Spot at BWI
reviews.text: Very clean, nice rooms: staff was very helpful and friendly; management went the extra mile and beyond

reviews.title: Nice, Clean, and happy
reviews.text: As a Hilton Diamond VIP, I have been at Hiltons around the world. This was my second time at a Hilton garden Inn. I have to say, the rooms very very clean. The bathroom was a nice size good shower, and also clean.. The staff was happy.. This is something that I look for is how happy are the people working here.. You can tell that this staff cares about the guest. Most of the other guest were airline crews, and biz folks. It has a nice little place to eat, and also some off site resturants.

reviews.title: I'll be back!
reviews.text: I have to say this Garden Inn was more like a full Hilton, and I like that about this chain. It is a very nice mid/upper hotel. I would stay there again..
Very friendly staff, quite helpful; clean; an excellent, convenient location
reviews.title: Awesome comfortable hotel
Loved It!
reviews.text: Honestly, I do my share of travelling and this is one of the better, more comfortable hotels I have stayed at. The front desk people were happy and always asked how I was. Comfortable is the best word for how I felt.

aka: Hilton Garden Inn Bwi Airport Hotel Linthicum
description: Each guestroom comes fully equipped with a refrigerator, microwave, two telephones with voice mail messaging, work desk, Herman Mirra chair, work lamp, 24 van complimentary van service to and from BWI Airport, 24 fitness and business centers, complimentary parking and Internet access.
